H0.text: Prevents mutation is an advantage of sexual reproduction for the survival of a population.

H1.text: Maintains genetic diversity is an advantage of sexual reproduction in the survival of a population.

H2.text: Reducing the number of genes is an advantage of sexual reproduction in the survival of a population.

H3.text: Creates competition between siblings is an advantage of sexual reproduction in the survival of a population.

A4.text: reducing the likelihood of the accumulation of deleterious mutations

A5.text: increases genetic diversity and impedes the accumulation of harmful genetic mutations

A6.text: The more genetic diversity a population has, the more likelihood the population will be able to adapt and survive.

A7.text: Gene flow can introduce novel alleles to a population. These alleles can be integrated into the population, thus increasing genetic diversity.
